title: 8chan
summary: 8kun, previously called 8chan, Infinitechan or Infinitychan (stylized as âˆžchan), is an imageboard website composed of user-created message boards. An owner moderates each board, with minimal interaction from site administration.[1] After going offline in August 2019, the site rebranded itself as 8kun and was relaunched in November 2019.[2]
